### Request for Proposal: IM/IT Resources

#### Project Overview

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is seeking the services of specialized information management and technology (IM/IT) resources to enhance the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects. These resources will supplement the current team to ensure that all projects adhere to the established project management and delivery processes, providing for efficient and effective management and delivery of IM/IT products or services to TBS clients.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-6359-75134364
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: 24062-24-022
* **Publication Date**: June 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 12, 2026
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to all World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement rules and regulations.

#### Selection Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined score of technical merit and price.

#### Tender Categories

This procurement is open to all suppliers who have the necessary expertise in IM/IT project delivery and support.

#### Frequency of Delivery

Deliverables will be provided on an ongoing basis, as determined by the requirements of the projects.

#### Preferred Language of Offer

English is the preferred language of offer. However, respondents have the option to offer in French as well.

#### Required Attachments

Please visit the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) platform to retrieve the tender notice, including the English and French versions of the request for proposal document.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications, please reach out to:
Richard Boyling
richard.boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca
(343) 542-9916
